title: Mollie Hemingway torches latest media frenzy over what the whistleblower said left a WH official ‘visibly shaken’
text:
As you know, the original whistleblower with second and thirdhand information has been replaced by a different whistleblower who is reported to have firsthand information. The story below involves the former:

Whistleblower at center of Ukraine scandal wrote a memo describing a White House official as "visibly shaken by what had transpired" in Trump's phone call. https://t.co/RshWDdUFX6 — Aman Batheja (@amanbatheja) October 8, 2019

Mollie Hemingway wasn’t having any of that:

1) Rollout of latest attempt to oust Trump was irreparably harmed by the transcript release. No need to tell us what those opposed thought of it because we already read it.

2) If any adult was "visibly shaken" by that call between world leaders, that speaks to their instability. https://t.co/4YhHw1JpWF — Mollie (@MZHemingway) October 9, 2019

Other than that, keep pushing the Democrat talking points, MSM!

"visibly shaken" – this is a joke. Maybe shaking from TDS https://t.co/NiTamsnrt3 — Susan Wilcox (@SuseWilcox) October 9, 2019

Exactly. The hearsay whistleblower either was told a drummed up account of the call or has such severe TDS that their perception of the call was distorted through that TDS lense. — T-Covfefe (@MyPlace4U) October 9, 2019

When you are trying to scale up nothing to something big phrases like "visibly shaken" add suspense. Sorta like the "literally shaking rn" twitter trend. https://t.co/kjGD6hq4JU — John Commodore Barry (@ShrinkGov) October 9, 2019

The hyperbole from the Left concerning this has really jumped the shark.
